title: STAINLESS STEEL WOLF HEAD CHAIN WITH MJOLNIR
description:
Ancient Treasures Customer

Vikings used necklaces with animals or beasts biting onto a ring where pendants were hung. This variant consists of a King Chain ending in the heads of Geri and Freki, the wolves of Odin, that bite onto a ring with a large Mj√∂lnir pendant.

This Chain is 100% handmade from Stainless Steel, which results in a piece of fantastic jewelry that will never rust. The process of crafting it by hand is very time-consuming, since each small link is added one by one to the chain. The chain comes with a lobster clasp that keeps this massive piece secured around your neck, as well as a pendant ring that can be opened and closed easily.

100% Heavy Stainless Steel
Handcrafted, forged link by link & bound by a lobster clasp
Choose between Chain Length of 20/24/28 Inches (50/60/70 cm)

title: MASSIVE STAINLESS STEEL WOLF KING CHAIN WITH MJOLNIR
description:
Handmade Chain Geri and Freki Viking Necklace with Thor Hammer Mjolnir!
The Kings chain was worn by Viking kings as a status symbol as the name applies. This is a 100% handmade Stainless Steel Chain. The crafting is a very time consuming process to put together the chain link by link.
The hand made chain connects together with a lobster clamp.
